Abyss:BrokenCrystal.NAME: Broken Crystal
Abyss:BrokenCrystal.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust a card in your discard pile.

Abyss:Drained.NAME: Drained
Abyss:Drained.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 Strength.

Abyss:Fumbling.NAME: Fumbling
Abyss:Fumbling.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, whenever you play an attack, shuffle a Wound into your discard pile.

Abyss:Necrosis.NAME: Necrosis
Abyss:Necrosis.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, shuffle a Decay into your discard pile.

Abyss:Panic.NAME: Panic
Abyss:Panic.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 Dexterity.

Abyss:Twisted.NAME: Twisted
Abyss:Twisted.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, gain 2 Constricted.
